name: Ham & Cheese Cucumber “Sushi” Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: cucumber, cheddar cheese, all-natural deli meat, carrot
recipeIngredient: 2 slices all-natural deli meat of your choice, thinly sliced
⅓ cup carrots, cut into matchsticks
recipeInstructionSteps: Slice cucumber into large 1-inch (2 ½ cm) thick slices.
Hollow out center of cucumber, leaving about ½ inch (1 cm) of cucumber inside.
Roll deli meat strips into a small roll.
Stuff cucumber pieces with deli meat, cheese, and carrots until center is filled.
